columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the order record.

columns.name: ORD_DOSING_WEIGHT
columns.description: Weight used for dosing. Always stored in kilograms.

columns.name: ORD_DW_REC_DTTM
columns.description: The instant at which the weight was recorded.

columns.name: ORD_WT_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column contains the source of the patient weight used for dosing patient-controlled analgesia (PCA) medication.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Treatment plan weight


Past measured weight


Most current measured weight (actual)


Ideal body weight


Adjusted body weight


User entered weight


Lean body weight


Dosing weight


Other

columns.name: ORD_DOSING_HEIGHT
columns.description: This column contains the patient height used for dosing PCA medication. The value stored is in inches for all orders after weight-based dosing was turned on, or starting in Spring 2008, whichever came first. Values are stored in centimeters for treatment plan orders made prior to that.

columns.name: ORD_HT_REC_DTTM
columns.description: The instant at which the height was recorded.

columns.name: ORD_HT_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column contains the source of the patient height used for dosing patient-controlled analgesia (PCA) medication.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Treatment plan height


Past measured height


Most current measured height (Actual)


User Entry


Other

columns.name: ORD_DOSING_BSA
columns.description: The body surface area used for dosing.

columns.name: ORD_BSA_SRC_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column contains the source of the body surface area used for dosing patient-controlled analgesia (PCA) medication.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Treatment plan BSA


Based on weight and height measured in the past


Based on most recent measured weight and height (actual)


User Entry


Based on ideal body weight and current/past measured height


Based on adjusted body weight and current/past measured height


Based on dosing weight and current/past measured height


Based on normalized BSA 1.7m2


Other

columns.name: ORD_BSA_CALC_DTL
columns.description: The dosing body surface area calculation details with weight, height and recorded instants.

columns.name: ORD_BSA_COMMENTS
columns.description: Generated comment for dosing body surface area.
